title: Flashlight Wear Remote
summary: Start/Stop Flashlight from your Android Wear with voice input "Start Flashlight"
developerAddress: 403-B, Bhatar Trade Center, Bhatar Cross Roads, Bhatar, Surat, Gujarat, India - 395017.
description: The mobile app is only a shortcut to start/stop the flashlight, it does not have any UI on phone.Android Wear app has UI to start/stop flashlight on mobile, You can also use voice command "Start Flashlight"
descriptionHTML:
The mobile app is only a shortcut to start/stop the flashlight, it does not have any UI on phone.
Android Wear app has UI to start/stop flashlight on mobile, You can also use voice command "Start Flashlight"
comments: Great Much better than just using the Wear screen
This is just what I needed Thanks
WTF WTF IS THIS APP? IT'S SOOO GOOD I AM TELLING THE NEWSPAPER GUYS THIS
